Name: Favored Enemy
Description: Choose a creature type to have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them. Additionally deals extra damage to them

Name: Natural Explorer
Description: Choose a type of terrain, gain benefits when traveling through that terrain such as difficult terrain not costing extra movement and gaining advantage on initiative.

Name: Fighting Style
Description: Choose a fighting style that modifies the way the ranger can attack and defend.

Name: Spellcasting
Description: Can cast spells from the ranger spell list.

Name: Ranger Archetype
Description: Chooses a archetype that grants additional abilities and options.

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: Can increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1.

Name: Extra Attack
Description: Can attack twice, instead of once, whenever they take the Attack action on their turn.

Name: Land's Stride
Description: Can move through nonmagical difficult terrain without penalty and can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them.

Name: Hide in Plain Sight
Description: Can hide even when only lightly obscured by natural phenomena.

Name: Feral Senses
Description: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell or hearing and can track creatures by scent.

Name: Foe Slayer
Description: Can take an extra turn during combat against a favored enemy creature that is surprised.
